product_name: The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Grizzly Pack jacket combines Polartec(R) Grizzly high loft fleece and FlashDry(TM) panels to offer packable, lightweight warmth for backcountry adventures. Inspired by bear fur, textured Polartec(R) Thermo Pro(R) Grizzly fleece combines textures and pile lengths to trap warmth close to the body. Lightweight Grizzly fleece offers an incredible warmth-to-weight ratio and packs down small. FlashDry stretch fleece panels breathe as they let you reach and stretch easily. Thumbholes in cuffs offer extra coverage for warmth. The North Face Grizzly Pack jacket also provides two zippered hand pockets and a hem cinch-cord.
short_description: The North Face Grizzly Pack jacket combines Polartec(R) Grizzly high loft fleece and FlashDry(TM) panels to offer packable, lightweight warmth for backcountry adventures.
